alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 4:49PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Spalding, southwestern Rockdale, Fayette, Meriwether, western Pike, western Henry, southeastern Troup, eastern Coweta, southwestern Clayton and Harris Counties through 515 PM EST... At 448 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Sandy Creek to Beulah, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, LaGrange, Griffin, McDonough, Fayetteville, Hamilton, Greenville, Peachtree City, Stockbridge, Hampton, Tyrone, Lovejoy, Manchester, Senoia, Hogansville, Grantville, Pine Mountain, Woodbury, Luthersville and Waverly Hall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
